zone.line: explain
you not think that you could discourse
respec their discrepancies on the subject
of your profession, if you understood
their agreements?-- Ion Manifestly.
Soc. How then does it happen
that you are possessed of skill{s} to
illustrate Homer & not Hesiod or
the other poets in an equal degree?
Are the topics of Homer dissimilar
from those of all the other poets?
principal
does he not treat of much of war
the and the mutual intercourse of
men, the and the distinct functions
& characters of the brave & the coward
professional
the priv professional & the private
person; the relation borne by men
to the gods & the gods to men, & the
mode of of
their communion; the proceedings of
heaven, of hell, of the origin of the
gods & heroes{:}--are the not [these] the
mountains
materials from which Homer
